trans-unit.source: Represents a view mode that displays data items in columns for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um modo de exibição que exibe os itens de dados em colunas para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GridView class and its supporting classes provide the infrastructure to display data items that are specified for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control in a series of columns.
trans-unit.target: A classe de GridView e suas classes de suporte fornecem a infraestrutura para exibir itens de dados que são especificados para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>controle em uma série de colunas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The columns have column headers, which are buttons that are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, and you can reorder the columns by using drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: As colunas têm cabeçalhos de coluna, que são botões que são derivados de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, e você pode reorganizar as colunas usando operações de arrastar e soltar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: Note that the columns of a GridView display data and do not provide direct access to the source of the data.
trans-unit.target: Observe que as colunas de um controle GridView exibem dados e não fornecem acesso direto à fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: To specify a GridView as the view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> property to a GridView object.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um GridView como o modo de exibição para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A>propriedade a um objeto de GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The GridView class is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de GridView é derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: You can define custom views by inheriting from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase> class that provides the supporting elements for a view.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir modos de exibição personalizados, herdando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>classe que fornece os elementos de suporte para um modo de exibição.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ViewBase>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create a Custom View Mode for a ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [como: criar um modo de exibição personalizado para um ListView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> that uses a GridView.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra um exemplo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>que usa um controle GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: ![ListView with GridView output](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView with GridView output") The columns in a GridView are defined as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects.
trans-unit.target: ![ListView com saída de GridView](~/add/media/listviewgridview.JPG "ListView com saída de GridView") as colunas em um GridView são definidas como <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can define <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> objects as child elements of the GridView.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], você pode definir <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>objetos como elementos filho de GridView.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: In code, you can add a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> to the GridView by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property and the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> method that is defined for the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class.
trans-unit.target: No código, você pode adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>GridView usando a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>método que é definido para a <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can use other <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> methods such as <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> to modify the columns in a GridView.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, você pode usar outras <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>métodos como <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A>e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>para modificar as colunas em um GridView.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define the columns of a GridView.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir as colunas de um controle GridView.

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-cs[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn)] To style the rows in a GridView, define a style for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> controls in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumn)][!code-cs[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/ListViewCode/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumn)][!code-vb[ListViewCode #GridViewColumn](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/listviewcode/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumn) ] para definir o estilo das linhas em um GridView, defina um estilo para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>controles em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: To add visual elements, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control, to a GridView, use templates or styles.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar elementos visuais, como um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>controle um GridView, use modelos ou estilos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [How to: Create ListViewItems with a CheckBox](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte [como: criar ListViewItems com uma caixa de seleção](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The column to add
trans-unit.target: A coluna a ser adicionada

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte.

trans-unit.source: Text cannot be added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Texto não pode ser adicionado a um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will cause an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chamar esse método fará com que uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Text string
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de caracteres de texto

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether columns in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> can be reordered by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se colunas em um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> podem ser reordenadas por uma operação de arrastar e soltar.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier Field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be reordered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as colunas podem ser reordenadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.AllowsColumnReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all settings, bindings, and styling from a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as configurações, associações e estilo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A> that is associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, in addition to any styling that was applied to it by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método Remove o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>que está associado com um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>, além de qualquer estilo que foi aplicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.PrepareItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to clear.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> para limpar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o attachedproperty ColumnCollectionProperty.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the ColumnCollectionProperty attachedproperty.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o attachedproperty ColumnCollectionProperty.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style to apply to column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo a ser aplicado aos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property are both used to define the visual tree for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> objects that represent the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ColumnHeaderContainerStyle e a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>propriedade são usados para definir a árvore visual para os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>objetos que representam os cabeçalhos de coluna em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ColumnHeaderContainerStyle property can also define column header content when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> is not by specified by defining a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> object.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ColumnHeaderContainerStyle também pode definir o cabeçalho da coluna de conteúdo quando um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>não for especificado, definindo um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define estilos, há algumas restrições.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos e modelagem](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # uso do elemento de propriedade XAML # # XAML valores `ResourceExtension` um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`A chave que identifica o estilo que está sendo solicitado.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a um recurso existente em <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sintaxe de elemento de propriedade é tecnicamente possível, mas não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [modelos e estilos in-line](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação de referência usando ou também é possível, mas não é comum.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is used to define the display properties for column headers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> que é usado para definir as propriedades de exibição para cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle*>

trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContainerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> for the column headers in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref> dos cabeçalhos de coluna em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu*>

trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderContextMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia de caracteres composta que especifica como formatar os cabeçalhos das colunas de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> se eles são exibidos como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>estiver definida, essa propriedade será ignorada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn.HeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar várias propriedades para especificar o formato dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority.
trans-unit.target: Se mais de uma propriedade for definida, o cabeçalho da coluna é formatado com o valor da propriedade que tem a prioridade mais alta.

trans-unit.source: The format for a column can be set on several types.
trans-unit.target: O formato de uma coluna pode ser definido em vários tipos.

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - ColumnHeaderStringFormat - - ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra as propriedades que podem ser usadas para formatar os cabeçalhos de coluna, ordenados do menor ao maior prioridade: - ColumnHeaderStringFormat - - # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados **true**| None|

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the column headers of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> if they are displayed as strings.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres composta que especifica como formatar os cabeçalhos das colunas de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> se eles são exibidos como cadeias de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a template to use to display the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um modelo a ser usado para exibir os cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnHeaderTemplate property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> property are both set, the ColumnHeaderTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade ColumnHeaderTemplate e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>propriedade são definidas, a propriedade ColumnHeaderTemplate terá precedência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use to display the column headers as part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> usar para exibir os cabeçalhos de coluna como parte do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selector object that provides logic for selecting a template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o objeto de seletor que fornece a lógica para selecionar um modelo a ser usado para cada cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set this property, the default logic is to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property for all columns if it is defined.
trans-unit.target: Se você não definir essa propriedade, a lógica padrão é usar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>propriedade para todas as colunas se ela está definida.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property and the ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector property are both set, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>propriedade e a propriedade ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector são definidas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>propriedade prevalece.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # uso do elemento de propriedade XAML ``` ``` # # XAML valores `ResourceExtension` um dos seguintes: `StaticResource`, ou `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Consulte [recursos XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey` The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested.
trans-unit.target: `DataTemplateSelectorClassKey`A chave que identifica a implementação do seletor que está sendo solicitada.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: A chave refere-se a uma classe derivada que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>Substituir.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically add an instance of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> class as a resource to the application resource dictionary.
trans-unit.target: Também por meio de programação, você pode adicionar uma instância do seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>classe como um recurso para o dicionário de recurso do aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation` A class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector> that implements a practical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: `MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation`Uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>que implementa um práticos <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>Substituir.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como mapear sua classe personalizada, consulte [Namespaces XAML e o mapeamento de Namespace para WPF XAML](../Topic/XAML%20Namespaces%20and%20Namespace%20Mapping%20for%20WPF%20XAML.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that determines the data template to use for each column header.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objeto que determina o modelo de dados a ser usado para cada cabeçalho de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content of a tooltip that appears when the mouse pointer pauses over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo de uma dica de ferramenta é exibida quando o ponteiro do mouse pausa em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: This property represents one of several ways to lay out and style column headers.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa uma das várias maneiras de fazer o layout e estilo de cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de cabeçalho de coluna de GridView e visão geral de modelos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values `toolTipContent` A string that becomes the display text for the ColumnHeaderToolTip.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` ``` # # uso do elemento de propriedade XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores `toolTipContent` uma cadeia de caracteres que se torna o texto de exibição para o ColumnHeaderToolTip.

trans-unit.source: `toolTipObjectContent` An object to use as the content for the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: `toolTipObjectContent`Um objeto a ser usado como o conteúdo para a dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this object is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or some other element that defines a layout for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, such as a text element.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esse objeto é um <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>ou algum outro elemento que define um layout para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>, como um elemento de texto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: In this usage, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> element is implicitly created from the parsed [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], and the `toolTipObjectContent` content is set as its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Nesse exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>elemento é implicitamente criado a partir de analisada [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]e o `toolTipObjectContent` o conteúdo está definido como seu <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: <`ToolTip` .../> See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: `ToolTip`.../> See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the content that appears as a tooltip when the mouse pointer is paused over one of the column headers.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que representa o conteúdo que aparece como uma dica de ferramenta quando o ponteiro do mouse está em pausa em um dos cabeçalhos de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is not defined.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão não está definido.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip*> dependency property.

trans-unit.target: O identificador para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnHeaderToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref> objetos que é definido para este <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property lets you modify the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, by using methods that are inherited from the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> class, such as the <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade permite que você modifique as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>, usando métodos que são herdados a <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601>classe, como o <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A>, e <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.Add%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.target: # # Uso do elemento de propriedade de XAML 0 # # XAML valores `OneOrMoreGridViewColumns` um ou mais elementos.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementação dessa <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Não use esse método para alterar a coleção de colunas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter, definir ou alterar as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>do objeto, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref> que está associado com a coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>especificada <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for each <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo é definido para cada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso de texto XAML consulte comentários.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> that references the style for each <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> que referencia o estilo de cada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value references the default style for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> control in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão referencia o estilo padrão de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> controle no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control that encloses the content that is displayed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo definido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> controle que inclui o conteúdo que é exibido por um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura estática no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] atribuindo seu valor estático para outro valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> style of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o valor desta propriedade estática define a chave de recurso que é usada para pesquisar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>estilo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> de padrão

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir esse estilo, fazer referência a GridViewScrollViewerStyleKey usando o [extensão de marcação X:Static](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e atribuir esse valor como o [diretiva X:Key](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) do novo <xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso de texto XAML consulte comentários.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> that references the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> that is applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> control for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> que faz referência a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> que é aplicada ao <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> controlar para uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is the style for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> object of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"></xref> in the current theme.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é o estilo para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> objeto de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListView"> </xref> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the style that is defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave que referencia o estilo definido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only static property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by assigning its static value to another property value.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura estática no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] atribuindo seu valor estático para outro valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this property's static value defines the resource key that is used to look up the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> style.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, o valor desta propriedade estática define a chave de recurso que é usada para pesquisar o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>estilo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To redefine this style, reference the GridViewStyleKey by using the [x:Static Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and assign that value as the [x:Key Directive](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the new <xref:System.Windows.Style>.
trans-unit.target: Para redefinir esse estilo, fazer referência a GridViewStyleKey usando o [extensão de marcação X:Static](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e atribuir esse valor como o [diretiva X:Key](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) do novo <xref:System.Windows.Style>.</xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can use this read-only property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as an [x:Key Directive](../Topic/x:Key%20Directive.md) of a <xref:System.Windows.Style> that redefines the <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade somente leitura em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] como um [diretiva X:Key](../Topic/x:Key%20Directive.md) de um <xref:System.Windows.Style>que redefine o <xref:System.Windows.Style>para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Style> </xref:System.Windows.Style>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso de texto XAML consulte comentários.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"> </xref> que faz referência a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> que é aplicada para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: The <>*>. O valor padrão é o <> </> *> no tema atual.

trans-unit.source: Prepares a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> for display according to the definition of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Prepara uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> para exibidos de acordo com a definição deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to apply styles, to set data bindings, and to attach a column collection to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode ser usado para aplicar estilos, para definir associações de dados e para anexar a uma coleção de colunas para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem"> </xref> para exibir.

trans-unit.source: Sets the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Define o conteúdo de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method to change the columns collection for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object.
trans-unit.target: Não use esse método para alterar a coleção de colunas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: To get, set, or change the columns that are defined for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> object, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter, definir ou alterar as colunas que são definidas para um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>do objeto, use o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"></xref> object to assign.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnCollection"> </xref> objeto atribuir.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Determina se é serializar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: The object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> is set.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>está definido.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>deve ser serializado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView.ColumnCollection*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto filho.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: O objeto filho para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o conteúdo de texto de um nó para o objeto.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro é uma implementação de membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele pode ser usado somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>instância é convertida em um <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild>interface.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser adicionado ao objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a representação de cadeia de caracteres da <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o número de colunas a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridView"> </xref>.
